document.query: CREATE TABLE `goTasty_utm_history` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `mobile_number` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `email` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `action_type` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `device` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `utm_campaign` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `user_agent` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `device_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `ip` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `country` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `url` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `tracking_site` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `created_at` datetime, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
